price: و به راستی، الله کسانی را که ایمان آورده‌اند به خوبی می‌شناسد و یقیناً منافقان را [نیز] می‌شناسد.
arabic: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna āmanū walayaʿlamanna al-munāfiqīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
And He will surely make evident
